select c.commodityName,d.commodityNo,c.orderNumber,c.addTime,c.commodityNum,c.totalPrice/100 totalPrice from sys_user a RIGHT JOIN t_order b on a.userId = b.userId LEFT JOIN t_order_detail c on c.orderNumber = b.orderNumber RIGHT JOIN t_commodity d ON c.commodityId = d.commodityId where 1=1
AND a.userId=#{relationMap.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( c.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') or d.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.fuzzyCondition}),'%') )
